title: Wallet -> Send: setHistoryFetchState error when sending token
body:
### Description

App crashed when i sent 1 STT from my status account to generated one on Goerli

Master `Build #2364 (17 May 2023, 10:28:51)` Mac M1 https://ci.infra.status.im/job/status-desktop/job/master/2364/

```
ERR 2023-05-18 17:33:47.739+03:00 rpc response error                         topics="rpc" tid=18973 file=core.nim:36 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wallet_getOpenseaAssetsByOwnerWithCursor, code:-32000, message:unsuccessful request: 403 Forbidden ]\n"
ERR 2023-05-18 17:33:47.739+03:00 error doing rpc request                    topics="rpc" tid=18973 file=core.nim:40 methodName=wallet_getOpenseaAssetsByOwnerWithCursor exception="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wallet_getOpenseaAssetsByOwnerWithCursor, code:-32000, message:unsuccessful request: 403 Forbidden ]\n"
ERR 2023-05-18 17:33:47.741+03:00 error onRxOwnedCollectibles:               topics="collectible-service" tid=18945 file=service.nim:397 errorStr="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wallet_getOpenseaAssetsByOwnerWithCursor, code:-32000, message:unsuccessful request: 403 Forbidden ]\n"
```
